Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 4 Saññojanagocchaka » 4.3 Saññojanasampayuttaduka » 4.3.7 Pañhāvāra » 4.3.7.3 Paccayānulomapaccanīya
Hetuduka
Saññojanagocchaka
Saññojanasampayuttaduka
Pañhāvāra
Paccayānulomapaccanīya
Hetuduka
95.
1556Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe cha…pe…  nasamanantare cha, naaññamaññe dve, naupanissaye cha…pe…  namagge cha, nasampayutte dve, navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā cha, novigate cha.
